document_data.Abilities: Due to the ''headband of intellect'' he wore, Bad Fruul was highly intelligent for a hill giant. He had been taught to cast the spells ''[[fire bolt]]'', ''[[shocking grasp]]'', ''[[true strike]]'', ''[[burning hands]]'', ''[[shield]]'', ''[[magic missile]]'', ''[[hold person]]'', and ''[[misty step]]''. He could also throw rocks.
document_data.Possessions:
Bad Fruul's defining possession was his ''[[headband of intellect]]'', which contained the soul of the drow priestess [[Narcellia Varam'myr]]. From it, Narcellia influenced his decisions and taught him [[spell]]s. It also had a special property that prevented it or him from being detected by [[scry]]ing.{{Cite adventurers league/Parnast Under Siege|8}}

In battle, Bad Fruul wore [[plate armor]] that had been decorated with bones. The [[helmet]] was decorated with a huge skull. His weapon was a huge [[maul]] made from [[iron]]. His steed was a [[mammoth]].
document_data.Activities: Bad Fruul sold his toenails, which could be used to make [[potion of giant strength|''potions of giant strength'']].{{Cite adventurers league/The Black Road|9}}{{Cite adventurers league/The Black Road|42}}
